Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

View on GitHub

/tasks

GET

Responses

200 Array of tasks.

POST

Parameters

Name Located in Description Type
body body Task we want to create. String

Responses

200 Value of the freshly created task.

/tasks/{id}

PARAMETERS

GET

Responses

200 Get a task by id.

/tasks/{id}/progress/{progress}

PARAMETERS

GET

Responses

200 Get the progress of a task from last progress id.
410 The task is not running anymore so operations are gone. Now use the result endpoint.

/tasks/{id}/result

PARAMETERS

GET

Responses

200 Get the final result of a task.
404 There is no result for this task because it is probably running.
